name: Butter Chicken

reason.rainy: Warm comfort food for a cozy evening
reason.cold: Rich and warming for cold weather
reason.weekend: Restaurant-quality meal for a relaxed weekend

steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for 30 minutes
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until slightly charred
Blend tomatoes into smooth puree
Heat butter, add tomato puree, cook for 10 minutes
Add cream, kasuri methi, and garam masala
Add grilled chicken, simmer for 5 minutes
Garnish with cream and serve hot with naan

name: Masala Dosa

reason.morning: Traditional South Indian breakfast to start your day
reason.pleasant: Light and crispy for pleasant weather

steps: Boil and mash potatoes coarsely
Temper mustard seeds, curry leaves, add onions and green chilies
Add turmeric and mashed potatoes, mix well
Heat dosa tawa, spread batter in circular motion
Drizzle oil on edges, cook until crispy
Place potato filling in center, fold dosa
Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar

name: Paneer Tikka

reason.pleasant: Light and flavorful for nice weather

ingredients: Bell peppers (1 each - red, yellow, green)
steps: Mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, tandoori masala, and lemon juice
Marinate paneer and vegetables for 30 minutes
Thread paneer and vegetables on skewers
Grill in oven or on tawa until charred
Sprinkle chaat masala
Serve hot with mint chutney
Garnish with lemon wedges

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpea curry with fluffy fried bread

reason.cold: Hearty and filling for cold mornings

steps: Pressure cook chickpeas with tea bag until soft
Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, add tomatoes
Add chole masala and cooked chickpeas, simmer
Knead flour with yogurt and water into soft dough
Roll into circles, deep fry until puffed and golden
Serve hot chole with bhature
Garnish with onions and green chutney

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Aromatic rice with mixed vegetables and spices

reason.pleasant: Fragrant and flavorful for any occasion

steps: Soak rice for 30 minutes, parboil with whole spices
Fry onions until golden brown, set aside half
Sauté vegetables with ginger-garlic paste and biryani masala
Layer rice and vegetables in pot
Top with fried onions, saffron milk, and ghee
Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes (dum)
Garnish with mint and serve with raita

name: Aloo Paratha

reason.cold: Warm and filling for cold mornings

steps: Mash boiled potatoes with spices and coriander
Knead wheat flour into soft dough
Roll dough into small circles
Place potato filling, seal and roll again
Cook on hot tawa with ghee until golden spots appear
Flip and cook other side
Serve hot with yogurt, pickle, and butter

name: Pav Bhaji
description: Spicy mashed vegetable curry with buttered buns

reason.evening: Mumbai street food favorite for evening
reason.rainy: Comfort food perfect for rainy weather

steps: Boil and mash all vegetables
Sauté onions and tomatoes with butter
Add pav bhaji masala and mashed vegetables
Cook and mash continuously, add water for consistency
Toast pav with butter on tawa
Serve bhaji topped with butter
Garnish with onions, lemon, and coriander

name: Idli Sambar
description: Steamed rice cakes with lentil vegetable stew

reason.morning: Light and healthy South Indian breakfast
reason.hot: Light and easy to digest in warm weather

steps: Steam idli batter in idli maker for 10-12 minutes
Pressure cook dal and vegetables until soft
Add tamarind water and sambar powder, boil
Temper mustard seeds, curry leaves, asafoetida
Add tempering to sambar
Serve hot idlis with sambar
Accompany with coconut chutney
